price: 8. “Ama (maxaa) looga soo dejin waayey xagga samada khaznad maal (ka buuxo uu kaga maarmo xoogsiga), ama u ahaato beer uu wax ka cuno? Waxayna daalimiintu yidhaahdeen: Ma raacdaan (Mu’miniintoy) waxaan aheyn nin sixran.”
arabic: أَوۡ يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٞ يَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aw yul'qā ilayhi kanzun aw takūnu lahu jannatun yakulu min'hā waqāla al-ẓālimūna in tattabiʿūna illā rajulan masḥūran
